To Theo van Gogh. The Hague, Sunday, 29 September 1872. Leo Jansen Hans Luijten Nienke Bakker
Huygens Instituut voor Nederlandse Geschiedenis (KNAW)info@huygens.knaw.nl Van Gogh Museum Amsterdam 2009

001 1 001Vincent van GoghTheo van GoghThe HagueSunday, 29 September 1872
To Theo van Gogh. The Hague, Sunday, 29 September 1872.
Original manuscript
Amsterdam, Van Gogh Museum, inv. no. b1 V/1962
Letter headed: ‘[Den Haag, 29 september 187]2.’ (see Textual Notes). The date is based on the harness racing mentioned in the letter (l. 18), which took place on 28 September 1872.
